success_criteria: Static code analysis passes; Unit test suite passes with >90% code coverage on new code.
escalation_procedure: PR author must fix issues before merge.
business_impact: Prevents simple bugs and code quality issues from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: All integration tests (DB, MQ, IPC) pass; Dependency vulnerability scan finds zero new critical/high issues.
failure_action: Break the build; Revert merge if necessary; Notify team immediately.
escalation_procedure: On-call developer investigates and fixes immediately.
business_impact: Ensures the core system services are stable and secure at all times.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for a release candidate build
success_criteria: Automated E2E regression suite passes (>95%); All performance benchmarks are met; Manual smoke test of key user stories is successful.
failure_action: Block deployment to production; Create release-blocking bug tickets.
business_impact: Final check to ensure a high-quality, performant, and stable release for customers.
